short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kut.Cards: Sentiment Analysis is a Chrome extension that allows you to analyze the sentiment of any text on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentiment reader is a chrome extension that takes the users current tab url and performs a sentiment analysis on it. It then returns the user a sentiment score and a face that represents the quality of the article that they are currently on.  Scores are created using two sentiment analysis packages VADER and Textblob.  Sentiment Key: # 0.0 = neutral # 0.0 < score < 1.0 = positive # -1.0 < score < 0.0 = negative. Having a sentiment score of the media you consume can help the user understand how reliable a media sources really is. Never browser the web blind, make sure to always protect yourself and know the true intentions of the media you are consuming.
